flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 259 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=259>>259.
If he does 65 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 259 = <<324-259=65>>65
He has to do 66 on Saturday because 65 + 1 = <<65+1=66>>66
#### 66

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 264, not 259. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
